description: Protocol for adult (8-10 week) mouse kidney dissociation.
before_start:
Prepare Bacillus Licheniformis enzyme mix just prior to starting dissociation:

 

Volume (µl) Reagent  Final concentration 
 894  DPBS  1X
 1  0.5 M EDTA  0.5 mM
 5  DNAse 1 (250 U/10 μL)  125 U / mL
 100  B. Lich (100 mg/mL)  10 mg/mL

+25 mg tissue / 1 mL enzyme mix

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines:
Storage Conditions of Reagents 

 

Reagent

Storage Condition 

DPBS (no Ca, no Mg)

4°C

0.5 M EDTA

room temp.

RBC Lysis Buffer

 4°C

Protease from Bacillus Licheniformis

Store 100 μL aliquots (100 mg/mL) in DPBS at -80°C

DNAse

  Store 10 μL aliquots (250 U/10 μL) in DPBS at -80°C

 

 

Required Equipment

 

Equipment

Supplier

Catalog no.

Thermomixer C or R

Eppendorf

5382000015 / Z605271

 

 

The protocol workflow is as follows: 

 

A. Isolate Kidney

B. First layer

C. Second layer

D. Third layer

F. Preparing cells for Chromium
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Remove fatty tissue and kidney capsule in ice-cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove fatty tissue and kidney capsule in ice-cold PBS.

components.data: Mince on petri dish, on ice (~2 min) until fine.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mince on petri dish, on ice (~2 min) until fine.

components.data: Weigh out 25 mg tissue per 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weigh out 25 mg tissue per 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL).

components.data: Quickly dissect and isolate kidney in ice-cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quickly dissect and isolate kidney in ice-cold PBS.

components.data: Place tissue in eppendorf tube containing 1 mL digest mix on ice for 2 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place tissue in eppendorf tube containing 1 mL digest mix on ice for 2 min.

components.data: Triturate gently 20x using 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate gently 20x using 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.

components.data: During the first 10 minutes, remove tube and shake every minute to re-suspend tissue chunks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: During the first 10 minutes, remove tube and shake every minute to re-suspend tissue chunks.
Triturate 10x every 2 minutes for 11.5 min.

components.data: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down cell clumps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down cell clumps.

components.data: Remove 80% of supernatant containing single cells and filter using 30 μM filter on 50 mL conical - rinse with 8 mL PBS/BSA 0.01% into 50 mL conical. Save conical with filter for subsequent steps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove 80% of supernatant containing single cells and filter using 30 μM filter on 50 mL conical - rinse with 8 mL PBS/BSA 0.01% into 50 mL conical. Save conical with filter for subsequent steps.

components.data: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks.

components.data: Triturate 10x with 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate 10x with 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.

components.data: Continue digesting while shaking in thermomixer at 1200 RPM for 23.5 min. Every 3 min passage 8X with 18 gauge needle (3X total).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Continue digesting while shaking in thermomixer at 1200 RPM for 23.5 min. Every 3 min passage 8X with 18 gauge needle (3X total).

components.data: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down cell clumps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down cell clumps.

components.data: Pipet ~80% of supernatant and add to 30 μM filter. Rinse with 8 mL PBS/BSA into the same 50 mL conical as first digestion.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipet ~80% of supernatant and add to 30 μM filter. Rinse with 8 mL PBS/BSA into the same 50 mL conical as first digestion.

components.data: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks.

components.data: Continue digesting at 1400 RPM in thermomixer at 4° C for 36 minutes. Every 3 min passage 8X w/18 gauge needle w/1 mL syringe (3X total).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Continue digesting at 1400 RPM in thermomixer at 4° C for 36 minutes. Every 3 min passage 8X w/18 gauge needle w/1 mL syringe (3X total).

components.data: Triturate 10x and apply to total volume to the same 30-μM filter used in previous steps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate 10x and apply to total volume to the same 30-μM filter used in previous steps.
Rinse filter with 8 mL PBS/BSA.

components.data: Transfer flow-through to two 15 mL conicals.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer flow-through to two 15 mL conicals.
Spin 500 G for 5 min at 4° C.
Remove supernatant.
Triturate 20x.
Let sit 2 min on ice.

components.data: Re-suspend both tubes (combined) in 100 μL total volume PBS/BSA and add 900 μL RBC lysis buffer (in 15 mL conical).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend both tubes (combined) in 100 μL total volume PBS/BSA and add 900 μL RBC lysis buffer (in 15 mL conical).
Add additional 9 mL PBS/BSA.
Spin 500 G for 5 min at 4° C.

components.data: Re-suspend pellet in 1 mL PBS/BSA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend pellet in 1 mL PBS/BSA.
Analyze using hemocytometer with trypan blue.
